Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:






Vehement watched intently as the Council retreated.  He laughed.  The side 
the Oblitercons were against were utterly pathetic in the battle.  Their so 
called leader was defeated in the first few cycles.  No, that side would not 
be a good one to side with. 

Vehement activated his comm. unit, speaking into the device embedded in his 
forearm computer.  "This is Vehement.  KitKat, I'm afraid you've shown that 
you aren't a reliable, since you ran at the first sign of danger.  If you or 
any of your members attempt to come onto my territory, my defenses and 
soldiers will shoot to kill, and will not take prisoners."

He smiled, deactivating the comm. unit, looking to his two men.  "Sun Crusher 
and Reflector, follow me.  We have work to do." the Archbishop said as he 
stood, heading down a hall and towards the nearest access hatch.
